LanguageData.Bullet_MechanoidDevastatorTurret.label: Blizzard Shards
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidDevastatorTurret.label: Mechanoid Devastator
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidDevastatorTurret.descriptio: Evolved defense building, primarily made to slow down any incoming offenses with its reactive orbs. The fireline Novagun is guided by an AI Smartfire upgrade and scans the surrounding area for thermal signatures and movement. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret.
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidDevastatorTurretEnhanced.de: Evolved defense building, primarily made to slow down any incoming offenses with its reactive orbs. The fireline Novagun is guided by an AI Smartfire upgrade and scans the surrounding area for thermal signatures and movement. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Upgraded.
LanguageData.MPC_MechanoidDevastatorTurret.label: Mechanoid Devastator
LanguageData.MPC_MechanoidDevastatorTurret.descriptio:
A turret with a heavy Novagun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.
Evolved defense building, primarily made to slow down any incoming offenses with its reactive orbs. The fireline Novagun is guided by an AI Smartfire upgrade and scans the surrounding area for thermal signatures and movement. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. The case can be slightly improved.
